content: this pattern creates the appearance of four large candy corns rotating around a central point using radial symmetry skills needed include changing color mid row creating a magic_ring single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet it is considered beginner friendly though may be difficult for extreme beginners who have no experience with the previously mentioned skills this pattern can be worked in any combination of yarns though it is recommended that all yarns are the same weight in order to avoid your color changes peeking through this pattern can be worked up with 4 colors or less but 4 colors are recommended for the look achieved in the photo provided in addition to yarn you will need * a 4 mm hook * a yarn needle when working with this hook and yarn size you should produce a 5x5 square please read through the tips and tricks section before you begin a half square version of this pattern is also included
